meanings.sent1: The cat hid underneath the bed.
meanings.sent2: She found her lost toy underneath the couch.
meanings.sent3: The treasure was hidden underneath a pile of leaves.
meanings.sent4: The truth lay underneath the layers of deception.
meanings.sent5: The roots of the tree spread far and wide, reaching underneath the ground.

meanings.definition: The lower surface or part of something
meanings.sent1: The underneath of the boat was painted blue.
meanings.sent2: He examined the underneath of the car for any damage.
meanings.sent3: The spider spun its web on the underneath of the table.
meanings.sent4: The underneath of the bridge provided shelter for the homeless.
meanings.sent5: The underneath of the mushroom was covered in tiny spores.
